text:
Oh, hey! Hello again. Hi. How are you? I am
here in a park. Because it´s nice and quiet.

And relaxing. Yeah. Hey, what was that? There
is something up in a tree. What is it? What

is it? Oh look, it´s a cat.
Hello little cat. Hey. Oh, and what was that?

Oh look, fish. Oh and frogs. Wow! And hey,
dogs! That gives me an idea. So, why don´t

you come with me. Come on, let´s go.
Hello Steve.

Hello Maggie. Hello again boys and girls.
Hi.

Maggie, I was at the park and saw lots of
animals. So, I am going to paint some animals

now.
Yeah!

Why don´t you try and guess what I am painting.
Hey, what´s this? What is it? What is it?

What is it?
I don´t know.

Hey look! It´s a fish.
Fish!

Now to colour it in. There we go. Look.
Both: It´s a fish.

Hey, why don´t you say it with me. But slowly.
What is it? It´s a fish. Yeah. And again.

It´s a fish. Well done! Now, let´s say it
fast. It´s a fish. Come on. What is it? It´s

a fish. And again. It´s a fish. What is it?
It´s a fish. Yeah. Super!

OK Maggie, take it away. Time for the next
one.

Ok.
Ok, what animal am I painting? What is it?

Oh, hi.
Hi.

What is it? If you don´t know say…
Both: I don´t know.

What is it?
Both: I don´t know.

I´ll paint some more. Here we go. What is
it? What is it?

I don´t know.
Don´t know. So say…

Both: I don´t know.
Let me finish the picture. Here we go.

Yeah.
So look, what is it?

Yeah!
Yeah!

Both: It´s a cat.
I like cats. So, come on. Say it with me.

But slowly. What is it? It´s a cat. And again.
What is it? It´s a cat. Well done. Now say

it fast. What is it? It´s a cat. What is
it? It´s a cat. And again. What is it? It´s

a cat. Well done! Thanks Maggie, take the
cat away and I´ll draw some more animals.

Ok. What´s this?
Yeah! Hey, let´s have some fun with Steve.

Time for some Maggie magic.
Oh hey, hi. Sorry, I´ve nearly finished.

Look, what is it? Yeah. It´s a frog. I like
frogs. But I need to colour it in. So, what

colour should I paint the frog?
Ready?

I think I´ll use green. Yeah. A nice green
frog. Here we go.

Abracadabra!
Oh, hey! Stop. Stop jumping. Stop jumping.

Stop jumping. Hey Maggie! Are you being naughty?
Yeah!

Look at the frog jumping. Maggie, stop the
frog, please.

Ok, stop!
Thank you. That´s better. But look! What

a mess! Green paint everywhere. Anyway, look.
What is it? Yeah. It´s a frog. Say it with

me. But slowly. What is it? It´s a frog.
And again, come on. What is it? It´s a frog.

Well done. Now let´s say it fast. It´s a
frog. So come on. What is it? It´s a frog.

And again. What is it? It´s a frog. Last
time. What is it? It´s a frog. Yeah. Well

done! Ok, take it away Maggie.
Ok.

Right. What shall I paint now? I know! What´s
this? What is it? What am I drawing? Do you

know?
No.

Yeah. Let´s see if you´re right. What is
it? What is it? Yeah! Look! What is it?

Both: It´s a dog.
That´s right. Oh and thank you Maggie for

not being naughty.
Yeah.

Look at my dog. I´ll just colour it in. Wonderful!
And why don´t you say it with me? Come on.

What is it? But slowly. We say… it´s a
dog. What is it? It´s a dog. Well done! Let´s

say it fast. It´s a dog. Are you ready? What
is it? It´s a dog. Come on. What is it? It´s

a dog. Last time. What is it? It´s a dog.
Yeah! Well done! So what should I draw now?

Ready? Abracadabra!
Oh Maggie, no! Oh, no! Oh, Maggie, that´s

very naughty!
Bye-bye.

Hey! Come back! Come here!
Bye-bye.
